SENATE JOINT RESOLUTION NO. 276 Senate Amendments in [ ] ï¿½ February 7, 2023 Confirming appointments by the Governor of certain persons communicated to the General Assembly August 1, 2022. ---------- Patron Prior to Engrossment--Senator Spruill ---------- Referred to Committee on Privileges and Elections ----------
